name: Take No Turns
description:
Tic-Tac-Toe but without taking turns! You can also overwrite your opponents X's with O's and vice versa.

Player 1 controls

(arrow keys) move cursor

(shift) place an "O"

Player 2 controls

(WASD) move cursor

(space) place an "X"

Match 3 sprites by "Buch"

Special Thanks to the Construct Official Forum for helping me with coding issues
